signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

welcome.title: Welcome to HelpWave
welcome.subtitle: A community where helping and receiving help is part of the same thing: taking care of each other.

permissions.title: Required Permissions
permissions.description:
To work properly, HelpWave needs access to:

- Notifications (to alert you of requests)
- Microphone and Camera (for video calls)
permissions.snackbar: You must accept all permissions to continue.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.description:
By using this application, you agree to participate in a community based on respect, collaboration, and mutual assistance.

You commit to providing and receiving help in good faith, respecting the privacy of other users, and using this platform solely for permitted purposes.

HelpWave is not responsible for the content of interactions but reserves the right to suspend accounts in case of misuse.
termsAndConditions.acceptLabel: I have read and accept the terms and conditions.

errors.onlyLetters: Use only valid letters and spaces
errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.internalError: Internal error: missing username or password fields.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

volunteerSkills.title: In which areas can you provide help?
volunteerSkills.selectMultipleOptions: You can select more than one option
volunteerSkills.generalAssistanceMandatory: The skill "General Assistance" is mandatory for all volunteers.

volunteerAvailability.title: Availability
volunteerAvailability.subtitle: On which days and at what times can you provide assistance?

registrationCompleted.title: Registration completed!
registrationCompleted.message: Your account has been successfully created. You can now start using the app.
registrationCompleted.subtitle: Thank you for joining HelpWave.

registrationCompletedRequester.title: You have successfully registered!
registrationCompletedRequester.message: Welcome to HelpWave. Here you will find volunteers ready to assist you with whatever you need, whenever you need it.
registrationCompletedRequester.subtitle: Thank you for trusting our supportive community.

registrationCompletedVolunteer.title: Thank you for registering as a volunteer!
registrationCompletedVolunteer.message: You are now part of HelpWave, where you can provide remote support to people who need it.
registrationCompletedVolunteer.subtitle: Your time and help can make a big difference.

addTimeModal.title: Add schedule for
addTimeModal.error_invalidTimeRange: End time must be after start time

controller.error_minOneAvailability: You must have at least one availability

endVideocall.title: Call Ended
endVideocall.progressInfo: You have helped {{assistances}} people. You're {{missing}} assists away from reaching level
endVideocall.reportHint: Did you have any issues? You can report them here.

requester.subtitle: Ready to request help today?
requester.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.

volunteer.subtitle: Ready to provide help today?
volunteer.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.

handler.alreadyAnsweredMessage: Another volunteer has already responded to this request. We really appreciate your intention to help ðŸ˜Š.

review_screen.form_report_hint: Had any issues? You can report them here.

dialog.logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?

dialog.confirmDeletionMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this skill?

snackbar.keepAtLeastOneSkill: You must keep at least one skill.

connectingScreen.searchingAssistance: We are looking for the best assistance for you.
connectingScreen.cancelRequestQuestion: Are you sure you want to cancel your help request?

tips.tip1: Remember to have good lighting so they can see you better.
tips.tip2: Keep your camera focused on the object or situation you need help with.
tips.tip3: Speak clearly and slowly, especially if your connection is slow.
tips.tip4: If you don't understand something, you can ask to have it repeated without problem.
tips.tip5: Have at hand what you need to make the most of the video call.

videocall_screen.title: Video Call
videocall_screen.confirm_end_call_title: Do you want to end the video call?
videocall_screen.confirm_end_call_content: This action will end the call and you won't be able to resume it.
